resources.string: In this activity, planes will be identified in the environment and will be marked with white dots. By pressing on the small arrow at the bottom of the screen you can choose the 3D model to insert into the environment. To place it you have to press on the screen over a detected plane. To change from place mode to delete mode you can press on the switch at the top left of the screen.

In this activity you can view 3D models of planet images in the gallery. To view them, frame the chosen image and wait for it to be detected. To reset the environment and models, press the CLEAN button at the top left of the screen. With the GALLERY button, you can share the images of the planets on other devices.

There are two modes in this application\:
 \-Plane Detection\: ARCore detects planes where you can place virtual animals on them.
 \-Augmented Image\: ARCore detects images of planets of the solar system and creates corresponding 3D models in the real world.
 For more information on using the various modes, click on the info button in the upper right corner.
